name: HTTP Request
description: This pattern is used to make a HTTP request to a server.

attributes.name: URL
attributes.description: The URL of the server to which the request is to be made.

attributes.name: HTTP Method
attributes.description: The HTTP method to be used for the request.

attributes.name: HTTP Header
attributes.description: HTTP Header to be sent with the request.

attributes.name: Cookie
attributes.description: Cookie to be sent with the request.

attributes.name: Session Storage
attributes.description: Session storage variable to be sent with the request.
